snippet: Travis Pastrana, who will make his second Nationwide start on Friday, is the latest outsider to raise hopes for Nascar, which seeks to exploit his desirable fan base.
abstract: Motorcyclist and action sports star Travis Pastrana will make his second start in a Nationwide stock car race, the latest outsider to raise hopes for Nascar, who seeks to exploit his desirable fan base.
lead_paragraph: Travis Pastrana, who will make his second Nationwide start on Friday, is the latest outsider to raise hopes for Nascar, which seeks to exploit his desirable fan base.

headline.seo: Motorcyclist Travis Pastrana Hopes Fans Follow Him to Nascar
headline.main: Motorcyclist Hopes Fans Follow Him to Nascar
headline.print_headline: Motorcyclist Hopes Fans Follow Him to Nascar
